ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: (Soulstice) Lynxiz is and Termitron was (he s flying now) at the top of a mountain. The reason that I asked if the Radicons were going to attack is

OOC: (Soulstice) Lynxiz is and Termitron was (he's flying now) at 
the top of a mountain. The reason that I asked if the Radicons were 
going to attack is because Termitron and Lynxiz might have been 
able to see them coming from a distance. Lynxiz was bird 
watching and absorbing the beautiful surroundings, while Termitron 
was scouting around the Chivitron base. I don't know if Train Wreck 
could run Termitron over from where he (Termitron) is. =)

OOC: (WingedWarrior) Where did Starstomp's asteroid land?

0==0 Lynxiz 0==0

Lynxiz looks up from her brief sojourn and notices a disturbance in 
the calm around her. She quickly pulls up her binoculars, and 
looks downward around her on the mountain peak. She initiailly 
doesn't find anything, but the an out of place site catches her 
attention, a train speeding towards the base. She hisses, "I know 
him from the last fight." She opens a commlink to the Chivitrons, 
"Chivitrons, your base has incomings, prepare for an attack." She 
pulls out her disk launcher, cursing the fact that it is a slower fire 
weapon. She fires four timed (4 secs upon impact) explosive disks 
ahead of the incoming train. Knowing that her disks would likely 
serve only as a distraction, she transforms, "Lynxiz, Beast Mode!" 
and starts down the mountain back to the Chivitron base.



On 5 Jul 2001, at 19:37, Soulstice Omega wrote:

> OOC: Yeah, I think the Radicons and Chosen Mafia would show up by now,
> wouldn't they?
> 
> BIC: Train Wreck spotted Termitron and Lynxiz. He laughed and cranked
> up his speed, driving extremely quickly towards Termitron...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: rAuq 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2001 5:35 PM
>   Subject: Re: Lynxiz
> 
> 
>   OOC: Are the Radicons attacking the Chivtrons again? (Termintron and
>   possibly Lynxiz would be able to see them before the got to the
>   base.)
> 
>   --- Lynxiz ---
> 
>   Lynxiz smiles, "I haven't seen any yet, and I'll be sure to notify
>   you when I do." She looks through her binoculars, and spots a large
>   bird, "Wow..." She keeps her binoculars trained on the strong
>   beautiful bird. "It even has a... well, it looks like a rabbit in
>   its talons." She takes the binoculars from her face, and offers them
>   to Termitron, "Here Termitron, take a look."
> 
>
